name: Awlad Hossain
bio: Awlad Hossain is a skilled criminal law expert dedicated to defending client rights. With over five years in the field, he offers sound advice and strong courtroom representation.

name: Farzana Rahman
bio: Farzana Rahman is a compassionate family law specialist helping clients resolve family disputes and custody cases with care, clarity, and professionalism.

name: Mahmudul Hasan
bio: Mahmudul Hasan advises businesses on contracts, compliance, and mergers. He simplifies corporate law for startups and established firms alike.

name: Nusrat Jahan
bio: Nusrat Jahan provides trusted guidance through complex divorce proceedings, ensuring her clientsâ€™ rights and interests are protected at every stage.

name: Tanvir Alam
bio: Tanvir Alam helps innovators protect their creations through patents, trademarks, and copyrights, offering strategic advice for IP security.

name: Shamim Reza
bio: Shamim Reza simplifies tax planning and dispute resolution for both individuals and businesses, delivering clear and reliable financial legal advice.

name: Sabina Yasmin
bio: Sabina Yasmin is a detail-oriented civil litigator, known for handling complex disputes with skillful negotiation and courtroom presence.

name: Mehedi Hasan
bio: Mehedi Hasan specializes in banking and financial regulations, helping clients navigate loans, compliance, and corporate finance strategies.

name: Afsana Mim
bio: Afsana Mim offers clear advice and support for immigration, visa, and citizenship applications, guiding clients through every step.

name: Kawsar Ahmed
bio: Kawsar Ahmed advises employers and employees on labor rights, contracts, disputes, and workplace law with precision and empathy.

name: Lamia Rahman
bio: Lamia Rahman is an expert in constitutional law, known for defending civil liberties and advising on constitutional challenges in court.

name: Raihan Kabir
bio: Raihan Kabir defends individuals and businesses from cyber threats, offering legal strategies for data protection and digital crime cases.
